Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-42366 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.35.0-12
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-42366 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.35.0-12. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package busybox is earlier than 1.35.0-12, affected by CVE-2023-42366
